:::

Highlighting ($H$) and editing ($E$) statistics for each domain, modality and translation direction combination ($n = 3$ post-editors per combination). Values after slashes are adjusted by projecting highlights of the specified modality over edits from [No Highlight]{.smallcaps} translators to estimate highlight-induced editing biases (@sec-qe4pe-highlights-edits). A **Random** baseline is added by projecting random highlights matching the average frequency over all modalities for specific domain and translation direction settings.
:::
